const CatFriends = () => {
  const itemsRef = useRef(null);

  const catList = [];
  for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {

  const scrollToId = (itemId) => {

        </button>
      </nav>

      <div>
        <ul>
          {catList.map(cat => (
            <li
              key={cat.id}
              ref={(node) => {
                const map = getMap();
                if (node) {
                  map.set(cat.id, node);
                } else {
                  map.delete(cat.id);
                }
              }}
            >
              <img
                src={cat.imageUrl}
                alt={'Cat #' + cat.id}
              />
            </li>
          ))}
        </ul>
      </div>
    </>
  )
